description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Amazing Wizard is a Magic Game.  Make your XBOX magically answer any questions.  English Only.  NOTE: CHATPAD REQUIRED. (Similar to 'Peter Answers' / 'Wizard 666')
